projects.title: DOUGHING
descriptions: Pizza online order application that is built with React and Typescript.
Using firebase to manage user authentication and order details.
All pizza ingredients and logo is created by myself with using Inkscape and Figma.
Using framer motion to make effective animation.

projects.title: E-commerce website
descriptions: E-Commerce website that is built with React and Typescript.
Created json file to storage items and users.
Created shopping cart modal which shows you items that are in your cart and total cost.
Used styled-component and Material UI for styling.

projects.title: Weather app
descriptions: A web application that tells the current weather, hourly weather, weekly weather and temperatures in a specific city.
The background image will be changed depends on current weather and local time.
Built with Next.js and Tailwind css, Open Weather API.

projects.title: Seattle DJ Website
descriptions: A website that has a client who is a DJ in Seattle, US.
Created web design based on his request and his favourite.
Used Cloudinary for storage data and used Emailjs for receiving, sending auto reply.
Created json file for making it easy to upload his new audio file.

projects.title: Exchanger
descriptions: Exchange currency calculator application that provides foreign exchange rates.
Able to check weekly changes of chosen rates.
Able to check all foreign exchange currency and show change percentage between yesterday.
Part of challenge is managing API data.

projects.title: Shiho N Portfolio
descriptions: A portfolio website that produce myself and showing my project.
Created design all by myself and made all logos and images by using Inkscape and Figma.
Used framer-motion to make images or logos efficiently and impressively.
Created contact form that make user can contact me from website and provide them auto reply.
